name: workshop and hardware
description: didn't use event to get money, income base on Workshop , Magnum Opus , Professional Contacts and Kati Jones. set up the breakers to run, then put down the hardware later, can put on Workshop, just be careful of the Tag and NBN

name: Exiled Faerie 2.0
description:
Faerie recursion, To use as super economic running, so pressure can be applied unexpectedly and when its needed.

The plan is to get in to anything, but only a few times. Hence Makers Eye rather than RDI and a few others...

Yes, not having plascrete has killed me, but I dont want to drop something to theme just to counter something that might come up

Decided on exile rather than kate because there are so few cards to get discounts on, and so much recursion.

A comment suggested I add in Shefluglebuster as it can turn the not discounts from kate into a bit of cash from all the 0 cost programs and recursion. Like the idea, went with it and decided to change the rest of the econ around a little as well.

Since I have noticed this deck needs big hunks of money now and then more than trickles of money to keep running every turn. Hopefully this will let me use big money with Femme to break later Sentries when I have run out of Faeries to recur.

name: Dino is a hacker v3

Thank you Chio for your feedback.

7MU isnt that bad. When I will have problem, I will replace Yog for Datasucker. Morning Star will continue the madness,

Question is when I delete buffed yog from Dinosaurus can I Scavenge Morning Star and put on it +2 Strengh ?

Added also Daily Casts. Just for tests. We will see how it works with Armitage and Kati Jones.

name: WYLD: GRNDL 2.0
description: Install big ICE and score out of hand EARLY, get the momentum moving and keep the cash flow up while scoring whenever possible. Punish the runner with scorched and power shutdown whenever possible.

name: Noise Haemorrhage
description: Stimhack = Haemorrhage

name: NBN - Upgraded Server
description: Make a remote, use Oversight to rez your bigger Ice(tollbooth/flare) in that remote, install all your upgrades, use Simone to advance a Beale to the moon!

name: HB Faster Stronger
description:
Harder. Better. Faster. Stronger.

The single Power Shutdown can open a scoring window for the Corp, in way to save one Biotic Labor, and can be recurred with Archived Memories.

name: Andromeda 16/02/14
description: 1 card change from Jens Erickson's World Champ deck

name: The world is watching 2.2
description: Fast Advance, Make sure that all of your servers are permeable, you want the runner to be able to get in, just slowly. If you put down a tollbooth or a heimidall too early they will just work on their economy and draw breakers. Yu want them to run lean, that way you can hit them with midseason. PSF is a threat, but not a promise.

Still focused on trying to make rezzing a very painful experience.

name: Weyland Strong Wall
description:
My goal is basically delay the runner long as I can as I safely build and score my agendas.

And I have to give the mandatory first time here and publishing a deck online.

name: Money Money Money
description: A deck a put together that gives me sustained and burst economy allowing me to just walk through about any ice I encounter.

name: Noise rebirth 0.2
description: Been a noise fan from day 1 and even though I left him aside lately to go play with Reina, I really feel that Keyhole might bring new life to my favorite runner. This is a first untested draft.

name: The Queen of Trashing
description:
This is the deck I made and have been playing against my friend for awhile now with excellent success, more than any other deck I've built before. It's on it's third version now. I just added Hemorrhage, and while I've to see how it works in this deck, I imagine it will do well and it can be tutored with djinn. I have only one core set or I might have three djinns.

Get Rook on ice early and drain the corp. You want an opening hand with Rook and some sort of economy. If no economy, at least a rook to keep the corp broke from the start. Use Crescentus to derez big ice and drain the corp to re-rez for +3 credits. Knight is amazing but use Djinn to get crypsis out early so you can safely facecheck ice and keep the corp poor.

Keep a lot of pressure on R&D by recurring parasites and locking the ice down with Knight. It's quick and easy to target a remote with knights and crypsis. Mimic is for Swordsman.

The idea behind the economy is to have minimal clicks for credits so you can use your clicks on caissa programs or other actions. Kati is the only click intensive resource since Professional contacts rewards you for what you should be doing anyway.

I'd love some feedback and more playtesting from other players! Thanks!

name: Bioroids need dedicated servers
description: The rise of runner decks that use account siphon and or derez ice in my meta made me want to try sticking dedicated servers in places.

name: Haas-Bioroid: Stronger Together
Gabe's Rolodex
description: Indexing makers eye plus gabe's normal tricks

name: The Wyrm Trashes the Ice :o
description: Recur the parasite as much as possible . Face check ice or infiltrate .whip out your wyrm or ice breakers if needed .start killing ice asap. Tutor a nerve agent or medium and go bananas haha. It surprisingly works for a spur of the moment deckm noise has always been my favorite and im determined to make him work so feedback is appreciated

name: Ra! Ra! Noise is back!
description: A whimsy. Trying Mr. Li as a way of guaranteeing better draws mid-to-late game, where this deck can falter a bit. A previous iteration with Wyldside + Aesops was good enough to put me in the top 4 of a Store Championship. This iteration seems better.
